name: KingEtemon
description: KingEtemon is a humanoid chimpanzee wearing a gold monkey suit with spiked shoulderpads. It wears a visor, a red and gold crown and a red cape with white fur trim. It wears blue gloves and genie shoes with white fur trim, and a wrestling belt which bears the Crest of Courage . It has black markings on its face, characters on its chest that read "Great King" ( 大王 , Daiou ? ) , and a crown emblem on its stomach.
